tag.description: A tag that from a version control system, either Subversion or Git.
tag.$comment: All fields are strings for cross-compatibility with older importers.

version_id.description: Hexadecimal SHA identifier of the version, if the event was related to a version.

message.description: Message added specifically to the tag. This is `0` if tags cannot receive messages in the system.

tagged_date.description: Moment when the tag was created or updated. This is `0` if the tag date is unknown.

tagger.description: Name of the developer who created the tag. This can also be the account name. This is `0` if the developer is unknown.

tagger_email.description: Email address of the developer who created the tag. This is `0` if the developer is unknown.
